thread.section_title: Hotel Belleclaire - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Well worth a stay
thread.title_full: Well worth a stay - Review of Hotel Belleclaire, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jeffrey F
title: Well worth a stay
text:
Stayed here for the last day of a 7 day visit to new York. The first hotel I stayed in was average at best so this was a nice change..
Reception staff were very accommodating and no wait time to check in.
The room I stayed was very nice, comfortable bed, clean, modern bathroom and large flat screen TV.
The area is perfect, walking distance to central park and the south ferry subway goes from 79st (less than 5 minutes walk) which brings you to time square and down towards world trade centre.
Also some very nice restaurants/cafe/bars around the area.
Effortless stay...
